item.title: Building an R community in Africa
item.description: R in Africa Over the past 2 years, we have seen R transform from just an academic and health care research language to one of the major languages in the budding data science community in Africa. For a long time, data scientists and related disciplines have relied on R and many other packages to analyse data, however, the broader developer community didnâ€™t fully understand its power in the tech industry.
